name: Under the Rug (Online Multiplayer Update!)
description:
Under the Rug is a game incorporating elements of strategy, chance, and memory. The original physical version of the game was created by Destin Hubble and can be found here.

The game has support for peer-to-peer internet play, as well as online play, without the need to port-forward. If the official dedicated server ever goes down permanently, I will upload the server software so that others may host it. The dedicated server information can be changed in the options.

Official Discord            My Website
